snippet: America and China's top diplomats stressed the need to manage differences and cooperate against global threats including Islamic State and Ebola, as they sought to warm the mood between their countries ahead of a summit next month....

headline.print_headline: U.S. and China Look to Manage Differences, Cooperate Against Threats
headline.main: U.S. and China Look to Manage Differences, Cooperate Against Threats

lead_paragraph: America and China's top diplomats stressed the need to manage differences and cooperate against global threats including Islamic State and Ebola, as they sought to warm the mood between their countries ahead of a summit next month.
